string.value: Takes a movie from the library and attachs it to the stage.
Creates an empty movie clip.
Creates a Text Field object.
Duplicates a movie clip.
Returns an Object representing the boundaries of the movie clip.
Returns the number of bytes that have been downloaded.
Returns the expected total number of bytes.
Returns the display depth the movie clip has been placed at.
Loads a document at the specified URL into the specified window.
Converts the point object from Stage coodinates to the Movie Clip's coordinates.
Starts playback at the indicated frame.
Moves the play head to the designated frame and halts.
Evaluates whether the movie clip is over the hit area.
Loads a JPEG or SWF into the movie clip.
Set variables from an external file.
Translates the coordinates of the movie clip to screen coordinates.
Advances playback to the next frame.
Starts playback.
Moves the playhead to the previous frame.
Removes the movie clip from the stage.
Masks the movie clip with the provided movie clip.
Lets the user drag the movie clip.
Stops play back.
Halts the user from dragging the movie clip.
Exchange the placement of this movie clip with another.
Removes a movie loaded with loadMovie.
Indicates the beginning of a new drawing path.
Indicates the beginning of a new drawing path.
Sets the line style.
Move the drawing to the specified coordinates.
Draw a line.
Draw a curve.
End the drawing path.
Removes all the drawing commands.
Invoked when the clip receives keyboard focus.
Invoked when the clip loses keyboard focus.
